actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide that Paget's disease developing a 10 percent or more degree of disability within 5 years after separation from active service during a period of war shall be presumed to be service connected.

summary.text: Provides that Paget's disease developing a 10 percent or more degree of disability within five years after separation from active service during a period of war shall be presumed to be a service-connected disability for entitlement to veterans' wartime compensation. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 312 (a))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide that Paget's disease developing a 10 percent or more degree of disability within 5 years after separation from active service during a period of war shall be presumed to be service connected.
